lead_paragraph: "Some would say this lunch has a kiss of death about it."
snippet: NBC Nightly News anchor Brian Williams and Katie Couric, the CBS Evening News anchor and former "Today" show co-host, were among those who honored, and roasted, outgoing NBC Chief Executive Jeff Zucker on Monday.

headline.main: Zucker the 'Good Guy' Honored and Roasted

abstract: NBC Nightly News anchor Brian Williams and Katie Couric, the CBS Evening News anchor and former "Today" show co-host, were among those who honored, and roasted, outgoing NBC Chief Executive Jeff Zucker on Monday.
